title: GoPro: Man and Grizzly Bear - A Unique Relationship
description:
More than a decade ago, Casey Anderson rescued a Grizzly Bear cub named Brutus.  Together they strive to educate kids and adults about the importance of sharing our habitat. 

To learn more about Casey Anderson, watch the full-length story, “Man and Grizzly Bear – Rewriting History"

Meet Bella, an orphaned grizzly bear cub living at the Montana Grizzly Encounter 

Learn more about Casey Anderson’s mission to help grizzly bears here 

Shot 100% on the HERO4® camera

Music
Loch Lomond
"Alice Left With Stockings and Earrings"

asset.title: GoPro: Man and Grizzly Bear - A Unique Relationship
asset.description:
More than a decade ago, Casey Anderson rescued a Grizzly Bear cub named Brutus.  Together they strive to educate kids and adults about the importance of sharing our habitat. 

To learn more about Casey Anderson, watch the full-length story, “Man and Grizzly Bear – Rewriting History" here: https://youtu.be/BA17_TvO6vM

Meet Bella, an orphaned grizzly bear cub living at the Montana Grizzly Encounter here: https://youtu.be/H_0RdN8n2iM

Learn more about Casey Anderson’s mission to help grizzly bears here: http://www.grizzlyencounter.org/

Shot 100% on the HERO4® camera from ‪http://GoPro.com.

Get stoked and subscribe: http://goo.gl/HgVXpQ

To license clips from this video go to https://licensing.gopro.com

Loch Lomond
"Alice Left With Stockings and Earrings"

asset.author: GoPro

transcripts: They went on the endangered species list in 1975. We think of them as man killers and blood thirsty beast. The real battle is helping people understand that there not monsters and hopefully taking that fear, changing it into respect so that they realize that they need them around. "Look at that view bud, gorgeous huh." They always say that the bear is kind of an umbrella species, it's protection remains, there is so many other things protected underneath that. So taking that bear out your going to see other thing go instinct like amphibians and butterflies. "Go boy." I want to bring wildlife and present it in a way that kids will listen to it and realize how cool it is. Let the voice, lets be heard. If the voice is heard then they'll be fine. People are not dumb. Their going to do the right thing.
